description: Rosslare hopes Brexit will bring benefits as more hauliers seek to avoid the UK land bridge.
title: Brexit: The Irish port of Rosslare is hoping to benefit
title_page: Brexit: The Irish port of Rosslare is hoping to benefit - BBC News
maintext: While the UK was part of the EU's customs union and single market it was quicker for hauliers to get their trucks to the European mainland by using the land bridge - a ferry from Ireland to GB and then a drive through GB to an English port before sailing on to the European mainland.
